description: The Dutch government approves plans to allow euthanasia for some terminally ill children.
title: Netherlands backs euthanasia for terminally ill children under-12
title_page: Netherlands backs euthanasia for terminally ill children under-12 - BBC News
maintext: In 2014, Belgium became the first country to allow for voluntary child euthanasia if they are terminally ill and in great pain and if they have parental consent. The Netherlands introduced the same rule for children over the age of 12 shortly afterwards.
